sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

group.Description: experimental group the participant belonged to

Levels.C1: Anode on P3(10/20 EEG system), Cathode on the upper part of the right arm
Levels.C2: Anode on P4(10/20 EEG system), Cathode on the upper part of the left arm
Levels.C3: Anode on the upper part of the right arm, Cathode on P3(10/20 EEG system)

Levels.Online: Applicating the NIBS during task execution
Levels.Offline: Applicating the NIBS before task execution
